overview: Boniface, or 'Bo' for short, loves airplanes, wrestling and his very best friend in the whole wide world, M the Minotaur - A Luchadore wrestling doll. When Bo is invited to Suzie's Birthday party, he begins to face the challenge that is growing up, and leaving behind his past.
tagline: Don't let the fear of falling keep you from spreading your wings.
title: The Comeback Kid
